Articles.Content: I'm definitely most excited for the colonies and the mechanics of ISRU to make colonies self-sustaining, and eventually so that colonies can manufacture the crafts to make new colonies
I’m mostly excited for multiplayer and colonies. Although procedural parts without a plugin sounds pretty great, too.
Question : I never wanted to play KSP with lots of Mods and I am so happy that the graphics and the enviorment of the planets are going to be so amazing without mods.
I am excited to explore distant star system and build up collonys
Super exited for the game and can't wait to see the improvements from number 1
I am excited for the new possibilities of content integration and automated worlds that are just as detailed as some of the AI generated art we see today.
BURN MY PC!
I'm excited to see what mods people come up with.
I'm most excited for mulitplayer

I've been looking forward to KSP2 since the original announcement.

I'm pretty excited for all of it.  Really looking forward  to exploring the Kerbol system before eventually trying  interstellar.
A much improved VAB/build system!  Modestly excited about Multiplayer!
im really looking forward to non-laggy, backgrounded colonies, and playing with nearteas parts in stock.
I can't wait for the updated interface and also want to try hydrogen deep space engine on my own. Of course, I'm excited about multiplayer and I want it to come out as soon as possible

As someone who only (sorta) recently started to get into KSP and has been playing an absolute load of it when the 2nd was announced, I'm definitely excited for the new tutorials that are in the game to allow new players to learn the game. But personally, I'm most excited for colonies like everyone else I just can't wait to build on the Mun and Duna!

What am I excited for?  You mean, besides the entirety of the game?  My top, A-number-1 thing that I'm excited for has to be procedural parts.  No more wondering which wing I should use on which craft, or how it will make my craft look.  Slap a wing on there and play around with it until I get the look and performance I want.

Beyond that, I'm just excited it's finally coming out.  And only a week before my birthday!
The procedural wings, the shaders, the visuals, the new parts! So much to love and be excited for!
Super excited for colonization and surface bases! It’s my favorite part of 1.
I can't wait for the new resource system and ISRU! Factorio in space!
Im exited for all the new stuff modders will create.
Can't wait to just get to play around with the new parts they're adding! Genuinely excited for orbital construction...gonna make some realistic battle ships!
I'm excited to answer the Kraken's Call through incessant Kerbal sacrifice  x_x
100%  hyped for the part customization options

I'm excited for the Orbital VAB. All my larger ships have been assembled from orbital boosters with docking ports on the side. Building a ship in a complete piece is something I've been looking forward to since before I knew it was coming.
I’m excited for the ability to execute long burns under warp. Never used the ion engine for that reason, and long NERVA burns on large ships soon soured….
Well, I'm hyped to see the fantastic reskins of the Kerbal system and to see what lies beyond... and also oooh pretty colors
